text:
I'm experiencing a blocking the startup web page of tomcat by proxy configuration

Steps to reproduce:

1.go to browser settings -> change proxy settings -> LAN settings
2.configure the proxy
3.startup the tomcat server
4.brows @ http://localhost:8080


experienced  result:
startup web page of tomcat is not appear

expected result:
load the startup web page of tomcat server
creator: kampriyadarshani326@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: This is not a Tomcat bug. Please use the users mailing list.
